page.title: 02Childs Ercall activities
page.content: {The Jubilee club}is for the old people in the village. The village had a fete for the Queen's siver jubilee with sports and a picnic. The old people went to the pantomime and then formed their own club. The Jubilee hall also started from the Queen's siver jubilee. The money that was left started the fund to provide toilets and changing facilities.{The hall was {officially opened in 1984. The activities in Childs Ercall every year are_ Childs Ercall fete, gymkhana and the horticultural show. {The mothers union}is specially concerned with all that strengthens and preserves marriage and christian family life. We meet once a month usualy in the vicarage, first we have a service, the vicar's wife leading, then a talk of some_thing, maybe the work of mothers union overseas
